title: Jonas Vingegaard, Wout van Aert Confirmed to Visma-Lease a Bike Tour de France Team
content:
Sepp Kuss, Matteo Jorgenson to ride for Vingegaard as injury doubts remain over defending champ: 'We don't know how far he can go yet.'

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard, Wout van Aert Confirmed to Visma-Lease a Bike Tour de France Team on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
